h2_title: Temple of Yellow Flowers Awaken Wine Worm
content: Head through the door on the right when you enter the Temple of Yellow Flowers. Run up the stairs, defeat the Snake Shriff Spirit, and go through the door it was guarding to find the Awaken Wine Worm in a barrel underneath a large tree.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Awaken_Wine_Worm_Locations.md', within the main section titled 'Awaken Wine Worm Locations', specifically from the subsection 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Awaken Wine Worm'.
The content is as follows:
Head through the door on the right when you enter the Temple of Yellow Flowers. Run up the stairs, defeat the Snake Shriff Spirit, and go through the door it was guarding to find the Awaken Wine Worm in a barrel underneath a large tree.
